      • calcDerivativeTerm

        protected double calcDerivativeTerm()
        Calculates the derivative term D based off errors. Assumes target velocity == 0.
        Overrides:
        calcDerivativeTerm in class PidController
        Returns:
        Estimated derivative term D.
